exercise1.name: Bench Press
exercise1.description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercise2.name: Push-Up
exercise2.description: The push-up is a bodyweight exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercise3.name: Dumbbell Fly
exercise3.description: The dumbbell fly is an isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles.
